content: Singaporean neuroscientist and politician **Choo Pei Ling**[a] (born 1986 or 1987) is a Singaporean neuroscientist and politician. A member of the ruling [People's Action Party](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party) (PAP), she is the [Member of Parliament](/wiki/Member_of_parliament) (MP) representing Tengah ward of [Chua Chu Kang Group Representation Constituency](/wiki/Chua_Chu_Kang_Group_Representation_Constituency) (GRC) since (/wiki/2025_Singaporean_general_election). ## Career Choo Pei Ling is a neuroscientist and Singapore Institute of Technology assistant professor. ## Political career Prior to entering politics, Choo was a neuroscientist. She first started her political career as a Second Grassroots Advisor for the Kembangan-Chai Chee ward in [Marine Parade GRC](/wiki/Marine_Parade_Group_Representation_Constituency) after [Tan Chuan-Jin](/wiki/Tan_Chuan-Jin) resigned over a extramarital affair in 2023. Choo was later fielded in [Chua Chu Kang GRC](/wiki/Chua_Chu_Kang_Group_Representation_Constituency) was elected into the [Parliament of Singapore](/wiki/Parliament_of_Singapore) on 3 May 2025 as part of [People's Action Party](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)'s team for Chua Chu Kang GRC representing the Tengah ward. ## Notes [Parliament of Singapore](/wiki/Parliament_of_Singapore)Preceded by[Zhulkarnain Abdul Rahim](/wiki/Zhulkarnain_Abdul_Rahim) [Don Wee](/wiki/Don_Wee) [Gan Kim Yong](/wiki/Gan_Kim_Yong) [Low Yen Ling](/wiki/Low_Yen_Ling) **[Member of Parliament](/wiki/Member_of_Parliament) for [Chua Chu Kang GRC](/wiki/Chua_Chu_Kang_GRC)** 2025–present Served alongside: **(2025–present): [Jeffrey Siow](/wiki/Jeffrey_Siow), [Zhulkarnain Abdul Rahim](/wiki/Zhulkarnain_Abdul_Rahim), [Tan See Leng](/wiki/Tan_See_Leng)****Incumbent** This article about a politician from Singapore is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Choo Pei Ling
